CalculationMatrixColumn.name: CalculationMatrixColumn
CalculationMatrixColumn.description: Defines a column in a Decision Matrix. The label for this object is Decision Matrix Column.

ApiName.description: The API name of the column.

CalculationMatrixId.description: The ID of the Decision Matrix to which this column belongs.

ColumnType.description: Specifies whether the column matches matrix input or is returned as output.

DataType.description: The type of data in the column.

DisplaySequence.description: The position of this column in the column order.

IsWildcardColumn.description: Specifies that this column can contain a wildcard value such as ALL.

RangeValues.description: A list of values that define range boundaries.

WildcardColumnValue.description: The value that indicates a wildcard, for example ALL. Applicable if IsWildcardColumn is true.
